Summary: Bowser and Zeus like these snacks Ruff Ruff
Text: I'm just now learning and starting to train my dogs. I went on Amazon and looked up what were the best treats to use and this product was at the top of the list. I bought the chicken and peanut butter ones and they like them a lot. In fact, I trained them on how to type and Bowser is typing this up as I dictate it to him. Ruff ruff. :)
